@ LittleField

622 Degraw Street, Brooklyn, NY 11217

(btwn 3rd & 4th Aves - Across The Street From 607)

Doors 9:00PM - 3:00AM / Advance Admission: $20

Tickets Available >> HERE

Homage To 90's R&B and Classic Soul

*SOUL POWER*

Fundraising Event -

In Support Of The Patricia F. Robinson Music Studio

"Music Is Supposed To Inspire"- Lauryn Hill

The Patricia F. Robinson Music School has been inspiring generations of children in Brooklyn for nearly a century. After inheriting the school from her mother, Patricia F. Robinson has solidified the school's position as a Brooklyn institution with her tireless work, teaching music and more importantly raising the next generation of musicians from Brooklyn. Brooklyn's musical roots run deep. From Jazz to gospel to Doo Woop to R&B to Hip Hop... Brooklyn has always been a force to reckon with. I am honored that my daughter is walking in the shadows of Brooklyn music royalty. Whether she continues to royal heights or not, I know she has been given a solid musical foundation. She will always have a family at the PFRMS, and she's a better person for having both.

Lastly, whenever the students from the PFRMS are in these major concerts and venues throughout NY, they are often head and shoulders above their colleagues.

I am honored to say... I am a parent of a child that attends the PFRMS. - A. Torrence

Tickets Available >> HERE

Presented By: KeiStar Productions | DJ SPINNA

Tuesday, December 31, 2013

Berlin, Germany

Saturday, December 7, 2013

Fresco, Massive Selector & Keistar Productions Present

WONDERFULL SF X: 10 YEARS CELEBRATING THE WONDER OF STEVIE

@ Mezzanine, 444 Jessie Street, San Francisco

21+ | 9pm-4am | Tickets: http://wonderfullsf.com

On Saturday, December 7, 2013, the Bay Area celebrates a decade of a winter tradition... Fresco, Massive Selector & Keistar Productions are proud to present

WONDER-Full SF X:

10 YEARS CELEBRATING

THE WONDER OF STEVIE

@ Mezzanine (444 Jessie St, SF).

Globetrotting superstar disc jockey, DJ SPINNA, headlines WONDER-Full : a dance party of epic proportions dedicated to Stevie Wonders essential compositions, covers, and goodies.

In 2003, WONDER-Full debuted in San Francisco. In its ten-year run, Stevie fans from across the Bay Area and beyond have embraced the event with beautiful energy, diversity and love that has made WONDER-Full SF one of the most anticipated events of the year! Please join us for a very special evening celebrating the musical genius of Stevie Wonder, but also the dedication of Bay Area fans that has made WONDER-Full SF, truly WONDERFUL!
